name: Erayd's PressF1 Cleanup CSS
description:
Cleans up the PressF1 forum by removing all ads and miscellaneous extra junk. The forum, and nothing but the forum!

Additional info can be found here: http://pressf1.pcworld.co.nz/showthread.php?103187&p=819667#post819667
